description.zh: PsiTransfer 是一个简单、开源且可自建的文件共享解决方案，旨在替代 Dropbox 和 WeTransfer 等付费服务。它支持多文件及大文件传输，具有响应式移动友好界面。平台提供可恢复的上传和下载、密码保护传输以及一次性下载功能。
description.en: PsiTransfer is a simple, open-source, self-hosted file sharing solution designed as an alternative to services like Dropbox and WeTransfer. It allows users to transfer multiple and very large files with a mobile-friendly interface. The platform supports resumable uploads and downloads, password-protected transfers, and one-time downloads.

feature.zh:
## 产品优势:

- 完全自托管，无需外部账户或登录
- 轻量级设计，可通过 Docker 或源码轻松部署
- 移动友好界面，适配各种设备访问

## 功能列表:

- 使用 [tus.io](https://tus.io) 实现断点续传上传和下载
- 通过流式传输支持超大文件
- 自定义上传文件夹的过期时间
- 一次性下载选项，增强传输安全性
- 支持将所有文件打包为 ZIP 或 TAR.GZ 格式下载
- 弹窗式文件预览
- 使用 AES 加密对下载列表进行密码保护
- 管理员页面查看 Bucket 信息（需设置密码启用）
- 基于 Vue 的轻量前端界面（压缩后小于 100KB）
- 可自定义上传和下载页面
- 支持通过环境变量或配置文件进行设置
feature.en:
## Benefits:

- Fully self-hosted with no external accounts or logins required
- Lightweight and easy to deploy with Docker or from source
- Mobile-friendly interface for seamless access on all devices

## Features:

- Resumable uploads and downloads using [tus.io](https://tus.io)
- Support for very large files through streaming
- Set expiration time for upload buckets
- One-time download option for secure transfers
- Download all files as ZIP or TAR.GZ archive
- Modal-style file preview
- Password protection for download lists using AES encryption
- Admin page for bucket information (secured with password)
- Lightweight Vue-based frontend (under 100KB gzipped)
- Customizable upload and download pages
- Configurable via environment variables or config files
